titles.title: For the relief of Veronica Mitina Haskins.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/20/2005--Introduced. Makes Veronica Mitina Haskins eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees. Considers Veronica Mitina Haskins to have satisfied the requirements applicable to adopted childrenn.
